data.name: Intruder In Antiquonia Demo
data.short_description: Enjoy a day in Antiquonia helping Sarah to remeber how she got there. In this classic point-and-click adventure, Sarah has to unravel the puzzle of her past as she explores the town where the Internet is not welcome. A beautiful adventure with high-resolution 2D graphics and a lovely soundtrack.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 2Ghz with SSE3 and 64 bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB of VRAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X 10.11 or newer
  • Processor: 2Ghz with SSE3 and 64 bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB of VRAM
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or newer / SteamOS 64 bit
  • Processor: 2Ghz with SSE3 and 64 bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB of VRAM
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
